long_description: The REI Tech-Compatible Powerflyte gloves are a great weight for cool-weather runs, and the special threads in the thumbs and forefingers let you use your touch-screen device. Powerflyte material blends polyester, nylon and spandex to provide outstanding dexterity; fabric breathes well, dries fast and provides good warmth. Tech-compatible forefinger and thumb threads let you operate your touch-screen device without taking the gloves off. Reflective trim increases your visibility in low light. Stretchy fabric of the REI Tech-Compatible Powerflyte gloves conforms to the shape of your hands for a great fit.
short_description: The REI Tech-Compatible Powerflyte gloves are a great weight for cool-weather runs, and the special threads in the thumbs and forefingers let you use your touch-screen device.
